sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"推，推动"之意。
means: propel ： 侧重指靠外力把人或物稳定、持续地向前推进。
push ： 普通用词，指用突然的力量把人或物
推向前进、推开或推到另一位置上。
shove ： 一般指猛或费力地推开或移动人或物。
thrust ： 常指迅猛地一推或突然有力地推进，侧重速度。

sentence.Network_en: Lambert gave Luckwell a hefty shove to send him on his way.
sentence.Network_cn: 兰伯特用力推了勒克韦尔一把，把他送上了路。

sentence.Network_en: When push comes to shove, you are on your own.
sentence.Network_cn: 如果形势糟糕，你就只能靠自己了。

sentence.Network_en: She gave Gracie a shove towards the house.
sentence.Network_cn: 她猛地将格蕾西朝房子那边推了一把。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 大学英语六级词汇表_大学六级 ... shorthand n． 速记，速记法 shove v． 推挤，猛推 shovel n． 铲子、铁锨v．铲.
新视野大学英语1-4册单词 - 豆丁网 ... punch n. 打洞器,钻孔机,殴打; shove n. 推,挤; aid n. 帮助, 有帮助的事物.
大学英语六级词汇表_大学六级 ... shorthand n． 速记，速记法 shove v． 推挤，猛推 shovel n． 铲子、铁锨v．铲.
石油英语词汇(S3) - 商务英语词汇 ... shoulder 肩 shove 走向滑移；涌流；推动 shovel 铲.

list.abs: shouldering torgue 台肩扭矩shove fault 走向滑移断层shove 走向滑移；涌流；推动
Shouting 大喊大叫shove off 开船shove 推
2011在职硕士核心词汇 - 学习资料 - 神州培训网 ... Draw up 起草 Shove off 动身 Make no question of 承认，不加怀疑.
shove的翻译查词例句词组大耳朵英语 ... shove on 推着往前走 shove one's clothes on [口]穿上衣服 shove out 把船撑开.
standing - 英汉词典 ... leave over 剩下 push comes to shove 事态严重 out to lunch 神经病，神志不清.

jx.jx_en_mean: move oneself to make room for someone
To push (a boat) away from shore in leaving.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English scūfan (verb), of Germanic origin; related to Dutch schuiven and German schieben, also to shuffle

entry.def: If you shove someone or something, you push them with a quick, violent movement.

example.ex: He shoved her out of the way...
He was then shoved face down on the pavement...
example.tran: 接着他被一把推倒，脸朝下趴在了人行道上。

entry.tran: 乱放;乱塞;随便放;胡乱丢
entry.def: If you shove something somewhere, you push it there quickly and carelessly.

example.ex: We shoved a copy of the newsletter beneath their door...
example.tran: 我们往他们门下塞了一份时事通讯。

example.ex: He shoved a cloth in my hand.

entry.tran: 情况不妙时;别无选择时;形势十分糟糕时
entry.def: If you talk about what you think will happen if push comes to shove, you are talking about what you think will happen if a situation becomes very bad or difficult.

example.ex: If push comes to shove, if you should lose your case in the court, what will you do?...
example.tran: 如果情况不妙，法庭上败诉，你会怎么办？

example.ex: When push comes to shove, you are on your own.
example.tran: 如果形势糟糕，你就只能靠自己了。

means.word_mean: 1. the act of shoving (giving a push to someone or something);
1. come into rough contact with while moving;

sentences.sentence: "The passengers jostled each other in the overcrowded train"
"the people pushed and shoved to get in line"
"She thrust the letter into his hand"

list.explanation: 在情况、情势再紧迫一些时或局势、情况更紧张时

example.en: When push comes to shove，you know I'll be on your side.
example.zh: 等到局势愈发地紧迫，你知道，我会站在你一边的。

auth_sentence.content: When push comes to shove, I'm committed.
auth_sentence.res_content: When push comes to shove, I'm committed.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: When push comes to shove, I'm committed.

auth_sentence.content: He then told one reporter to "Shove it".
auth_sentence.res_content: He then told one reporter to "Shove it".
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He then told one reporter to "Shove it".

auth_sentence.content: A slight shove on his chest sent him staggering back.
auth_sentence.res_content: A slight shove on his chest sent him staggering back.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: A slight shove on his chest sent him staggering back.

means.word_mean: 推, 猛推, 乱推,乱挤,推撞

sentences.en: The people shoved to get on the bus.
sentences.cn: 人们你推我挤争着上公共汽车。

sentences.en: Help me shove this furniture aside.
sentences.cn: 帮我把这家具推到一边去。

jushi.english: I'm sorry for bumping into you; somebody shoved me.
jushi.chinese: 撞了你很抱歉,有人推了我一下。

jushi.english: She shoved the chair closer to the table.
jushi.chinese: 她把椅子推向离桌子近一点的地方。
